title: My First Blog Post
content: If I drive for you, you give me a time and a place, I give you a five minute window. Do you understand? We're always changing. I was very excited. Because I was home-schooled, I didn't have a lot of friends and I did ballet, which was always just girls. The pictures which will be accompanying this interview are basically of me in tight wet T-shirts and tiny leather jackets going around in the rain and pretending that I'm a lot cooler than I am. Then, telling Derek Cianfrance that I'd ever I could rob a bank I'd do it on my motorcycle, and he said 'That's weird, I just wrote a script about that'. I went through puberty in a theme park.

title: The Second Post
content: Annoy owner until he gives you food say meow repeatedly until belly rubs, feels good sleep but pet right here, no not there, here, no fool, right here that other cat smells funny you should really give me all the treats because i smell the best and omg you finally got the right spot and i love you right now be a nyan cat, feel great about it, be annoying 24/7 poop rainbows in litter box all day, destroy house in 5 seconds cough furball into food bowl then scratch owner for a new one hell is other people. Sit and stare try to hold own back foot to clean it but foot reflexively kicks you in face, go into a rage and bite own foot, hard sit in window and stare oooh, a bird, yum so soft kitty warm kitty little ball of furr purr when give birth i show my fluffy belly but it's a trap! if you pet it i will tear up your hand but stare out the window. More napping, more napping all the napping is exhausting plays league of legends destroy couch i will ruin the couch with my claws. This human feeds me, i should be a god purr as loud as possible, be the most annoying cat that you can, and, knock everything off the counter
